required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Influence of Clopidogrel on the Pharmacodynamics and Safety of Fradafiban in Healthy Male Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Influence of Oral Doses of 75 mg Clopidogrel on the Pharmacodynamics and Safety of Fradafiban After Oral Doses of 30 mg Lefradafiban Tid Over 8 Days in Healthy Male Subjects. An Intra-individual, Open Trial.

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the influence of 75 mg Clopidogrel on the pharmacodynamics and safety of 30 mg Lefradafiban tid

primary_outcome.measure: Inhibition of platelet aggregation in platelet rich plasma (PRP)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 383:30 hours after first drug administration
Up to 383:30 hours after first drug administration

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum concentration of the analyte in plasma at steady state (Cmax)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 383:30 hours after first drug administration

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma (AUC)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 383:30 hours after first drug administration

primary_outcome.measure: Amount of the analyte excreted unchanged in the urine (Ae)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 176:00 hours after first drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 5 days after last drug administration
Pre-dose and 384:30 hours after first drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with clinically significant findings in vital signs
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 5 days after last drug administration
secondary_outcome.description: systolic and diastolic blood pressure, pulse rate

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes from baseline in bleeding time
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and 384:30 hours after first drug administration

arm_group.description: All patients received the same treatment: Lefradafiban only (day 1-4) Lefradafiban in combination with Clopidogrel (day 5-8) Clopidogrel only (day 9-12)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Written informed consent in accordance with good clinical practice (GCP) and local legislation
- Healthy male subjects
- Age ≥ 18 and ≤ 45 years
- Broca ≥ - 20 % and ≤ + 20 %
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any finding of the medical examination (including blood pressure, pulse rate and ECG) deviating from normal and of clinical relevance
- History or current gastrointestinal, hepatic, renal, respiratory, cardiovascular, metabolic, immunological, hormonal disorders
- Diseases of the central nervous system (such as epilepsy) or psychiatric disorders
- Chronic or relevant acute infections
- History of
- Allergy/hypersensitivity (including drug allergy) which is deemed relevant to the trial as judged by the investigator
- Any bleeding disorder including prolonged or habitual bleeding
- Other hematologic disease
- Cerebral bleeding (e.g. after a car accident
- Commotio cerebri
- Intake of drugs with a long half-life (> 24 hours) within 1 month prior to administration
- Use of any drugs which might influence the results of the trial within 10 days prior to administration or during the trial
- Participation in another trial with an investigational drug within 2 months prior to administration or during the trial
- Smoker (> 10 cigarettes or 3 cigars or 3 pipes/day) or inability to refrain from smoking on study days
- Alcohol abuse (> 60 g/day)
- Drug abuse
- Blood donation within 1 month prior to administration or during the trial
- Excessive physical activities within 5 days prior to administration or during the trial
- Any laboratory value outside the clinically accepted reference range
- History of any familial bleeding disorder
- Thrombocytes < 150000/µl
